product_overview: Class Tower is a premium SaaS platform designed for condominium and building operational management, focused on real-time synchronization, data transparency, and user-friendly interfaces to modernize communication, security, and administration for high-end residential and commercial buildings.
core_goals: Centralize all condominium operations within a single portal.
Digitize all physical records and processes to improve efficiency and transparency.
Ensure legal security with photographic evidence and comprehensive audit logs for all activities.
Enable real-time communication between management and residents to reduce misunderstandings and delays.
key_features: Dashboard with real-time operational metrics and KPIs including occupancy rates, pending packages, and maintenance incidents.
Portal de Avisos for creating and sharing prioritized community communications with color-coded urgency levels and instant synchronization.
Package management system with photo capture on entry, storage in Supabase, and timestamped retrieval logs.
Incident logging (Diário de Bordo) with categorized record keeping, automatic user attribution, and immutable history.
Comprehensive booking calendar for unit and common area reservations with administrative approval workflows.
Unit and floor management explorer with detailed responsible personnel and contact information, plus a visual occupancy map.
Document repository supporting categorized uploads, granular access control, and multiple file types.
Vendor and service provider directory with status management and evaluations.
Robust Supabase-based RBAC authentication system ensuring secure access and role-specific permissions.
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate via Supabase Auth respecting RBAC roles (admin, attendant, resident).
Admins access dashboard KPIs and manage all modules including users, bookings, incidents, and documents.
Attendants perform operational tasks such as package registration with photo capture, incident logging, and managing community notices.
Residents consume information via notices, access their packages, download documents, and make bookings for facilities.
All actions are synchronized in real-time using Supabase Realtime to deliver up-to-date data without requiring page refreshes.
validation_criteria: Successful role-based authentication and enforcement of permission levels across modules.
Real-time synchronization of data on all key features verified with no forced page reloads.
Audit trails and timestamp verification for package handling and incident logging.
Accurate display and updating of dashboard KPIs reflecting live data.
File upload and access control validation for the document repository.
Functionality of priority levels and color coding in the communication portal.
Operational correctness of booking workflows including status confirmations.
Complete and accurate management of unit and vendor records with appropriate status states.
